name: Aine - The Goddess of Sexual Love
name_original: Aine - The Goddess of Sexual Love
description:
Support the game on Patreon

An 18 year old boy who has trouble socializing, especially with girls, while he is weeping in his room, a fairy with very peculiar tastes known as Aine suddenly appears. Aine will do anything to turn this loser into a real sex appeal with her magical powers.
